Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: diana
Reviews.Content: Very good quadrant processor easy to hook up easy to use.love all the functions on it and the fact it has 8 camera inputs.makes it nice

ProductInfo.Features:
8 Channels Video Color Quad Processor, Real Time 240FPS Display
720x480 High Resulotion , QUAD Split, Full Screen, PIP Screen, Auto Sequence Mode
Camera Title, Real Time, Alarm/Video Loss/Motion Detection/Event Report/Built in Buzzer
This 8CH Quad unit is CIB Security Exclusive with CIB brand name
One Year Warranty, full Technical Supports if Purchased Directly from USA Security Store
